title: Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis Head to 'Happiest Place on Earth' After Rough Week
text:
Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis knew exactly what they needed to shake off the week of drama amid Demi Moore's memoir -- a trip to Disneyland!

The stars hit up Disneyland in Anaheim this weekend with their two kids, Wyatt and Dimitri.

Related:

Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis Troll the Tabloids

Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis Dominate Table Tennis During Clayton Kershaw's Charity Event

Mila Kunis, Johnny Depp & Mariah Carey: This Weeks Most Stylish Celebs

Mila Kunis & Kristin Bell Look Good for 'A Bad Moms Christmas'

Ashton and Mila even stopped for a romantic selfie in front of Sleeping Beauty's castle.

"Magical weekend @disneyland An imagination tinderbox. That Walt guy had a vision," Ashton wrote on Instagram.

Fans were able to snap some pics of the family walking around the park, and Mila's new blonde and blue hair could be seen from underneath a baseball cap.

View photos

It's been a rough go for the couple, after the press from Demi Moore's memoir, "Inside Out," has mainly focused on the negative aspects of her former marriage to the "That 70's Show" star.

Along with talks of threesomes and infidelity, the "G.I. Jane" star did not paint a very positive picture of her ex-husband, and he has been getting raked over the coals.

View photos

After days of silence, Ashton finally took to social media and made a statement:

"I was about to push the button on a really snarky tweet. Then I saw my son, daughter, and wife and I deleted it."

Ashton then caught some flack for adding a tweet, promising to tell fans "the truth," but only getting people wrapped up in a marketing stunt that led back to a messaging app he invests in.

Mila has not made any public statements about the situation with Demi, but it's apparent she's sticking by her man in the wake of controversy and showing that they will remain a family unit.
